name: Best If Used By
description:
Submission for reddit r/indiedev game jam mixtape #1

Sometimes we let things go a little bit too long in the fridge. Taking it out will just be another reminder of how much of a lazy wasteful slob you are! Well thanks to someone's unabashed bachelor lifestyle, new life is created! As some old leftovers gained self-actualization, solve puzzles and make daring escapes in this amazing and addictive game!

Gamepad is suggested, but not necessary
